title: Teenager killed, one in custody after Jasper County shooting
content:
JASPER COUNTY, MS (WDAM) -
A teenager is dead, and another one is in custody after a fatal shooting in Jasper County.
Authorities were called to the suspect's mobile home on County Road 237 in the Moss Community after a 911 call came in around 8:45 p.m. Sunday.
Captain Robert Morris, investigator with The Jasper County Sheriff's Department, said the incident happened during a party.They are investigating whether or not the shooting was accidental, or intentional.
Authorities aren't releasing the names of the victim, or the suspect until further investigation has been done.
The teen killed is a student at Stringer Attendance Center.
The autopsy on the teen will be conducted Tuesday.
No charges have been filed at this time. There was no altercation at the party, and about eight people were in attendance.
